Posts.EditableText: After finishing my game/mud for questnet, I got bored. So I found this BYOND program. If anyone knows how to program in the stupid BYOND language, and wants to help me with this BYOND mud, drop me a line....or something.

Posts.EditableText:
good old BYOND.  loved that darn program.

first of all, you need to make the visuals for characters, and terain.

secondly, i suggest you read the tutorial because if i was too sit here and explain it all, i'd be sat here for a long time
